faqs.question: What are we building in this course?
faqs.answer: You're building an OpenAI-powered FAQ chatbot with Next.js, RTK Query, and tested with Jest + Playwright.

faqs.question: How do I run the project locally?
faqs.answer: Install dependencies, add your .env.local with OPENAI_API_KEY, then run `npm run dev`.

faqs.question: Where do AI responses come from?
faqs.answer: From the /api/ask route which integrates with OpenAI. You can toggle MOCK_AI to return canned responses.

faqs.question: Do we have tests?
faqs.answer: Yes. Unit tests with Jest and e2e tests with Playwright. Run `npm run test` or `npm run test:e2e`.

faqs.question: How do I deploy this app?
faqs.answer: Use Vercel. Set OPENAI_API_KEY in project settings, then connect your repo and deploy.
